subject: Outstanding Commission Payment Request
description_text:
Team
simsonn





I hope this message reaches you.



I am writing as an affiliate of your program through GoAffPro to request
payment of a pending commission for a sale generated. The details are below:



Order Value: $1,363.29


 Commission: $80.96



 My PayPal account is linked in GoAffPro for payment processing, but for
your convenience, here are the details again: alvaroaponte22548@gmail.com


I request your prompt assistance in processing this payment. If you need
more information, please let me know.



Thank you for your attention and I look forward to your confirmation.



Sincerely,

Dayana Trujillo

Affiliate Partner

any further response.

Hi welcome10,  We made a batch commission payment the day before yesterday. According to our policy, commissions for November are settled in January, and the payout starts only when the total amount exceeds USD 100.

Excuse me, but I don't understand what the payment misinformation is
that you, as a company, are providing. I have an email from you
stating that there's only a $60 limit, and now you're saying it's a
total of $100. I'll attach a screenshot of your response in an email
you sent me. Honestly, this is the first time this has happened to me
with a store, and it's regrettable.


El mar, 13 ene 2026, 21:31, service@simsonn.com
